document.title: AUTONOMATA POI Corpus
document.intro: The AUTONOMATA POI Corpus is a database containing ca. 800 read-aloud Points-of-Interest (POIs) from The Netherlands and Belgium, containing names of restaurants, hotels, camp sites, bars et cetera. The corpus contains recordings of 80 speakers with various native languages, a total of ... Dutch as spoken by native and non-native speakers Not all documentation is available in both languages. This annotation is a manually created broad phonetic transcription (phonemic transcription) including syllable boundaries and stressmarkers.

access.title: available for non-commercial use by non-commercial organisations; user license required
